post.body: - thanks so much - I took it with my phone - but I can probably still get you a copy! :)
- thanks bro - I am going to work on it!
- you didn't know that he was short, fat, & cute?! :)
- too funny man! Def. a classic!!
- you gotta love the iPhone & how it spells words for you! :)
- loving all the "firsts" bro - soaking it all in!!
- Santa - Satan - it's all the same!! :)
- thanks bro! We had a blast!!
- got ya covered bro!
- I'm so freaking jealous! I want something to hit NC!! We need some ice - some snow! Something!!
- well looks like you missed that prediction! :) The best decision Andy Reid made all season was benching him Chicago.
please call me back- I have a question for Tandy!
- hopefully they weren't Clemson tickets. You know my Heels own Clemson & they we will be cutting down the nets this season!
- nope! Prison Break baby!!
- yeah baby! The hallway - plus two new rooms - plus the other 2 rooms in the back! Doubling our preschool space! :)
- banking on my Christmas being complete with a BIG Lakers win today!!
about 2 head 2 bed! 2day was a day that I won't soon forget! Chapel Hill, UNC Basketball Museum, Roy William's, Dean Dome=Awesome Day today!
pumped to track my package and find out that my Flip MinoHD will be here on Monday. Can't wait to break it in!
Just got done with the wedding rehearsel - now it's time for some Chilis-meeting Becki & Bro there! Chilis is my all-time favorite!!
Heading to a wedding rehearsel - mono or whatever this is - is kicking my butt. I could sleep on the side of the road - right now! Tired!!
http://twitpic.com/sacr - Santa just came to visit us! Have to say he's the cutest Satan I've ever seen!
Exhausted-I'm going home to crash before I have a wedding rehersel to be at tonight.
At the UNC Student Store-hitting the 25% off sale. We got the tip from an insider (aka. Vic). Thanks bro!
I'm thinking about planting a church in the Dean Dome - Joel Osteen ain't got nothing on that!
http://twitpic.com/s7ij - Listening to his greatness! No doubt Roy is the real deal. Hate Carolina but you can't hate Roy!
Roy just entered the room - sitting 1 table from us!
http://twitpic.com/s74u - Yep - standing beside Eric Montross!
http://twitpic.com/s74l - Waiting for Roy to arrive!
http://twitpic.com/s6zr - This place is AMAZING! Tarheels just do it right!!
It looks like starting in Jan. we are going to have all staff in the offices at least 2 days a week! That will change everything! Can't wait
Staff meeting DONE & it's only 6:30 pm. Earliest night in our staff meeting existence. Starting in Jan.-no more night staff meetings!! :)
Starting staff meeting early tonight!! Gotta love that! That means we are going home earlier tonight!! Yeah baby!!
Got Bro over here @ the office while Becki is running some errands-I'm showing my boy the ropes-after all he is the future pastor or PRC :)
check-out pictures from our Volunteer Staff Star Dinner -> http://tinyurl.com/5mae66
Brandon & Ben are out continuing our PRC Give Back Project. Their giving Christmas to a struggling family in our church. Awesome stuff!!
Blown away by the incredible people that God continues to send to PRC. The heart of some people - blow my mind! Love our people!
http://twitpic.com/tc1v - Just got my Catalyst gift - man you gotta love what those guys do!
Tuesdays = LONG day of meetings. Also filming the message for the 28th since we have no services that day. Internet campus & podcast only!
Heading to bed-Exhausted! TONS to get done this week! Its going to be insane but its going to be AWESOME! Lots happening @pineridgechurch
Eagles look UNBELIEVABLE on their opening drive! Wish we would have played this way all season! Look great the last 3 games!
about to watch my Eagles keep themselves in the playoff hunt! Then we gotta catch up on the Survivor finale & Prison Break!
Up & rolling - heading to Lynchburg today to see my family. We'll be there through the weekend.
BYE-BYE Boston & your freaking 19 game winning streak! See you in the NBA Finals!!
lakers by 7 with under a minute to go!
4 point lead for the Lakers with 2:00 min to play. DO NOT let the Celtics come back!!
we got us ball game in LA! Lakers you need to pull this off to complete my Christmas! So freaking SICK of the CELTICS!
you know you are exhausted when you are on your 2nd cup of coffee and you are falling asleep while drinking it! I am wore-out!!
Lakers up 6 at half - looking good! Kobe has 16 & is looking dominate. Going to need a BIG 2nd half!
Well we know Kobe came to play on Christmas day. He is going off early & often!
End of 1st - Lakers look good! Gotta stop giving up open lay-ups! If the Lakers pick-up their D-I think they can do this!
Lakers vs. Celtics in 20 min. Let's go Lakers!!
http://twitpic.com/wh5n - Bro is in heaven cruising around in his new ride. It's all he wants to do! Hilarious!
Ate way too freaking much! I'm officially done eating for the year!!
Gotta love a nice gift card to the Buckle. That's my store!
Had our 1st CMas last night-Santa came this morning-Beckis parents & bro came over for gifts later-now down in Durham opening more gifts!
Santa came! :) Merry Christmas!
Merry Christmas!!
has anyone else seen this? -> http://tinyurl.com/8r7f52 -no wonder people in this country think Christians are freaks! I get it-but come on!
bout to head to bed-Santa is coming tonight & its Brogan's 1st Christmas! We just put out cookies & milk & took some pics. Lovin' it! :)
Just hot done eating more than any human should ever eat! Stuffed out of my mind! About to open gifts!!
